comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

I am trying to read data from an XML file on a webhosting so that user can view the updated data every 10 Sec


Actual results:

The updated data is not display on the current Mozila Firefox page.


Expected results:

If i refresh the page, (press F5), the current page should be updated with the new data found in the XML file. But still the old data is display.
